channel.title: Take a look
channel.description:
I'm running a 508 server and loads of people are connecting just no-one appearing ingame. One person appeared ingame yesterday and thats it.
Heres loads of connections. Note where the side bar is. But no-ones coming ingame only that 1 person yesterday lol. [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/6638/ipshit.png[/img]
Here is a pic of my port open... [img]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/2705/portopen.png[/img]
Tried turning FireWall off and i've added exceptions etc. Forwarded ports via router browser. Tried utorrent also but nothing seems to work. I just dont understand how 1 person logged in yesterday but noone else is lol.
My no-ip is set up correct as its the same what people used to connect with on my 317's.

item.title: Take a look
item.dc:creator: @Rii0N Rii0N
item.description:
@Rii0N wrote:

Thats what berkys is. IP box pops up before client to input a IP then client runs after you hit ok button.

Read full topic

item.title: Take a look
item.dc:creator: @Rii0N Rii0N
item.description:
@Rii0N wrote:

Hmm i uploaded berkys client for them to connect with as i can connect no problem with it. I’ll remove d-l link meaning they gotta get there own. might be berkys client thats the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Take a look
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Your server is probably rejecting their client. Offer your own client.

Read full topic
